categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic military bases

nodes.text: Traitor's Remorse was a shantytown for defectors from the Galactic Empire. Formerly an unnamed base for Rebel Alliance insurgents, it was expanded by the New Republic, who would examine and interview the defectors to determine their fate. Yrica Quell resided in the outpost after deserting the Empire on Nacronis during Operation: Cinder. The base suffered four bombings during the time Caern Adan was stationed there.
